description: Create an equipment movement trip job production plan link.
permissions: Requires permission to create on the related equipment movement trip. Admins and members of the trip broker can create the link.
side_effects: Creates an equipment movement trip job production plan link; the server creates or assigns a job production plan for the trip and may create related customer, job site, material supplier, material site, and job schedule shift records.
validation_notes: --equipment-movement-trip is required. The equipment movement trip must be valid for dispatch.
